creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
generally I consider tinymce a very nice module.

- For 1.4 the editor could be further polished (allready mentioned by Jörn).
- One very valuable feature could be several (or at leat 2) editable areas.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 20029
make download page in tinymce module consistent with the rest of lenya

the info page that informs a user that s/he needs to download tinymce
separately now uses the page:page namespace and has a look-and-feel consistent
with the rest of lenya.

no functional changes, please review. again, lazy consensus in effect.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
several editable areas are not really a problem, but we would need to discuss
how to store such documents. and there is always the danger of locking the user
in to a particular editor. imho, every page should remain editable with oneform
if the user so chooses...
closing for now, but it's on the radar.
